CustomField.description: 7362DF 16GW supports two powering options: – AC power: 85 V to 280 V AC, 47 Hz to 63 Hz with battery backup – DC power: -36 V DC to -72 V DC using redundant DC power inputs
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 7362DF 16GW supports two powering options: – AC power: 85 V to 280 V AC, 47 Hz to 63 Hz with battery backup – DC power: -36 V DC to -72 V DC using redundant DC power inputs
CustomField.label: Powering
